help.title: Help
help.section1: Zoom in with a double click or the '+' in the top left corner or search your address using the search bar at the top.
help.section2: With a left click on an existing business (blue circle) you can edit this business.
help.section3: With a right click on any position on the map you can create a new Business.

loginhelp.title: Information
loginhelp.section1: To make changes on the map, you have to be logged in with an OpenStreetMap-Login.
loginhelp.section2: But in this view you can already peer, how the website works.

validate.streetOrPlace: The street or the place are required
validate.notStreetAndPlace: The street and the place can't both be filled
validate.subtitle: Fields with * are required (At Fields with (*) is just one at a time required)

infoTexts.category: Choose a category for your business so that it is easier to identify what your business is about. Search through the data for a suitable category and if you have not found one, click on "Own Category" to define your own category.
infoTexts.address: The address is loaded automatically from the point you have choosen. Take possible changes if necessary. The field "Place" is only allowed if the business has no other address.
infoTexts.name: Write the name of your business in this field. e.g. Migros
infoTexts.opening_hours: In this field are the opening hours of your business. e.g. Mo-Fr 07:00 - 12:00 13:00 - 17:00
infoTexts.phone: Here comes the phone number under which you, respectively your business, are reachable.
infoTexts.email: Here comes the email address under which you, respectively your business, are reachable.
infoTexts.website: In this field is the website of your business.
infoTexts.wheelchair: Tick the box if your business is wheelchair accessible respectively how accessible it is.
infoTexts.description: In this field you can include extra informations about your business. e.g. Our bakery is also a mail-administration center
infoTexts.note: A note is used to inform other mappers about non-obvious information about an element, the author's intent when creating it, or hints for further improvement.

popups.buttontitle: You have to be logged in for this function
popups.warning: There is already an open Note for this business.

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.section: If you press Yes all your changes will be lost.

node.title: Already existing business
node.section1: At this position is already a business with exact same name and category
node.section2: You have the possibility to edit the already existing informations with a left click on the business on the map.

note.title: Already existing changes
note.section1: For this business there already exists a change, which isn't processed yet.
note.section2: You have the possibility to leave a comment directly in OpenStreetMap:

error.title: Error
error.nominatim: There is a problem with the connection. Check your internet connection or try it again later.

osm.login: User could not be logged in.
osm.load: There is a problem with loading data from OpenStreetMap. Check your internet connection or try it again later.

overpass.surrounding: There is a problem with uploading the data to OpenStreetMap. Check your internet connection or try it again later.
